SELECT a.nm, a.pic, a.created_at AS createdAt, COUNT(DISTINCT b.ifeed) AS feedCnt, COUNT(c.ifeed) AS favCnt FROM t_user a left JOIN t_feed b ON a.iuser= b.iuser LEFT JOIN t_feed_fav c ON b.ifeed= c.ifeed WHERE a.iuser= #{targetIuser}
